name: @porsche-design-system/angular
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.build:wrappers: ng build components-wrapper --configuration production && yarn rollup -c ./projects/components-wrapper/rollup.config.js
scripts.test:e2e: yarn build-app && PORT=4200 BROWSER=none jest --colors -c tests/e2e/config/jest.config.ts
scripts.test:vrt: if [ "$CI" != true ]; then yarn build-app; fi && PORT=4200 BROWSER=none jest --colors -c tests/vrt/config/jest.config.ts
scripts.replace:initialStyles: placeholder='<!--PLACEHOLDER_PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_INITIAL_STYLES-->' && partial=$placeholder$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-js/partials").getInitialStyles())') && regex=$placeholder'.*' && sed -E -e "s@$regex@$partial@" src/index.html > src/index.tmp.html && rm src/index.html && mv src/index.tmp.html src/index.html
scripts.replace:fontLatin: placeholder='<!--PLACEHOLDER_PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_FONT_LATIN-->' && partial=$placeholder$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-js/partials").getFontLinks({ weights: ["thin", "regular", "semi-bold", "bold"] }).replace(/https:\/\/cdn\.ui\.porsche\.com\/porsche-design-system/g, "http://localhost:3001"))') && regex=$placeholder'.*' && sed -E -e "s@$regex@$partial@" src/index.html > src/index.tmp.html && rm src/index.html && mv src/index.tmp.html src/index.html
